column4: I'm getting an error when trying to install software/update it says Software index is broken and to use the command sudo apt-get install -f but when I run it it says dpkg was interrupted you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem

it says setting up java-common,libltdl3,odbcinstldebian1,unixodbc
